description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Forget everything you thought you knew about the falling block genre. EleMental Orbs allows you to destroy orbs with other falling orbs pieces. You can buy pieces to help yourself or punish your opponent but be careful with your gold or you may find yourself in a hole you can't get out of. Includes: 2P Versus and 3 1P modes.
description.short: Forget everything you thought you knew about the falling block genre. EleMental Orbs allows you to destroy orbs with other falling orbs pieces.
